column2: Kings & Things''''' is an educational film released on [[18 June|June 18]]
column4: from a series called ''[[Wikipedia:Standard Deviants|Standard Deviants]]''. While not entirely devoted to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' it is used as the center piece and includes footage of Tolkien himself.

column1: Prepare to enter an age when the world was ruled by wise kings
column3: and the power of magic united entire kingdoms. This is the world of ancient myths
column5: and modern fantasy literature. Contains ''Swords & Sorcery'' and ''Monsters & Mayhem''.
